Parameter Detail

degree

Degree of the underlying ring. Each node is connected to degree predecessors and degree successors.

msg.leafs

Number of leafs in messages

msg.fingers

Number of fingers in messages

infectable

If defined, the protocol will not start synchronously. It will start based on the result taken from Infectable protocol specified.

tabu

Tabu list size. The tabu list is used when selecting a node, to avoid to visit too early a node that has been visited recently.
